name: aioi
description: A companion app for [ORCÎ›](https://wiki.xxiivv.com/#orca) using its [UDP operator](https://github.com/hundredrabbits/Orca#udp) to send complex OSC message to multiple hosts.

scripts.clean: rm -r ~/Desktop/Aioi-darwin-x64/ ; rm -r ~/Desktop/Aioi-linux-x64/ ; rm -r ~/Desktop/Aioi-win32-x64/ ; echo 'cleaned build location'
scripts.build: npm run clean ; npm run build_osx ; npm run build_linux ; npm run build_win

author: @makio135 @ashugeo
